error.message: Class Drupal\type_style\TwigExtension\TypeStyleExtension extends deprecated class Twig_Extension: since Twig 2.7, use "Twig\Extension\AbstractExtension" instead
Call to deprecated method drupalPostForm() of class Drupal\Tests\BrowserTestBase. Deprecated in drupal:9.1.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use $this->submitForm() instead.
